text:
Matcha 101

  • How is matcha made?

    T2 Matcha’s made using tencha, green tea leaves that have been grown under shade in the last two weeks. The leaves are then picked and steamed immediately to lock in that vibrant green goodness, then refrigerated until they’re ready to be ground into matcha. We grind our matcha on demand so that we can ensure a good shelf life, plus share with you only the freshest, highest quality organic matcha.

  • Good to be green

    Matcha tops our superfood list for its energy-giving properties as well as its ability to help us unwind.

    The combo of caffeine and amino acid L-theanine buddy up to give you a slower release of caffeine. This means no caffeine jitters, and also means you can power on for longer. Great for hitting the books or before a work out!

  • Matcha with food

    Matcha’s rich and grassy taste can also be enjoyed in smoothies, sprinkled over porridge, or mixed up in frothy latte. You can even add it sweet treats like bliss balls!

How to make matcha

Shop the video


This green smoothie is a feast of good-for-you fruits and vegies plus a little matcha hit.

This super satisfying dessert takes seconds to prepare and makes for the perfect summer treat!

Mix up a batch of these tasty matcha-spiked cacao bliss balls, and you’re all set for snack time.

It doesn’t get any better than a matcha and turmeric loaded smoothie bowl topped with juicy fruit!

Cool, calm and creamy, this iced matcha latte is a super chilled way to cool off when the sun’s at its peak.

Join the Matcha Movement

Cove Cocktails Sea Breeze Kit


The Sea Breeze cocktail is the perfect drink for Summer. A delicious combination of vodka, cranberry juice and grapefruit juice that’s light and refreshing. Perfect for brunches, aperitifs or a day by the beach.



Whether you’re looking to learn a new skill or having a get together with friends – our Cove Cocktail kits add fun to any occasion. Our Cove Cocktail kits also make a fantastic gift for birthdays, celebrations or to spread a little cheer.

.Cove Cocktails Sea Breeze Kit includes:

  • 20cl / 200ml bottle of our award-winning Cove Vodka
  • 2 x 20cl Cranberry Juice
  • 20cl Grapefruit juice
  • Detailed instructions

All you need are glasses, ice and a fresh lime.

This deliciously fruity cocktail will have you dreaming of sunny days by the sea.

Devon Cove Vodka is exceptionally smooth and made from King Edward potatoes, lovingly grown on our family farm overlooking Hope Cove, Devon and Devon spring water. Our copper pot, single distilled vodka is handcrafted in an artisan distillery using the finest ingredients to ensure its smooth, luxurious taste.

Not sure which cocktail kit to choose, then let us surprise you, sign up to our Cove Cocktail Subscription Club and receive a different cocktail every month. Sign up now for 20% off your first box at

Her wide range of skills means Darci can create everything from a modern & elegant cake, a traditional tiered wedding cake to something whimsical and playful. Her enthusiasm and hard work make Darci's cake pieces of art.

Kake is located in Canmore and delivers custom cakes to all mountain destinations. Kake's focus is on creating modern cakes made from scratch from good old fashioned flour, milk, eggs and butter. Darci opened her shop in her hometown of Canmore in February of 2016 after working for a cake maker for many years.

Tastings can be booked by appointment only and can accommodate up to 3 people.

Italian Wine Restaurant

Mulino a Vino

At Mulino a Vino, guests are treated to an incomparable, creative dining experience in a cozy, seductive hidden gem tucked away from the bustling Meatpacking District. The menu puts a modern twist on traditional Italian cuisine, as created by Executive Chef Massimiliano, whose prior experience includes Michelin-rated, Gordon Ramsay London, and Arbutus. Accompanied with a strong emphasis on Italian wine, guests can truly experience the best of what Italy has to offer during your next private event. Whether you’re in the private Wine Cellar (seats 20), the intimate living room Library (seats 6), or hosting passed bites in the Main Dining Room (seats 30), everything can be customized to your unique event needs

Miller Lite Lager Beer (12 fl. oz. can, 24 pk.)

by Miller Lite |
Item # --

About this item

  • American style pilsner
  • 4.2% ABV
  • 96 calories and 3.2g of carbs per 12oz. serving
  • Sessional beer for any occasion
  • Most gold medal awarded light beer
Top Rated


In 1975, Miller Lite established the light beer category and introduced the perfect balance of lightness and flavor nationally. It’s a real Pilsner, brewed to have more color and taste with only 96 calories per 12 ounce serving. Miller Lite has a golden color and deep flavor, yet is delicately balanced to be light on calories. Our unique process is more time consuming, but has earned us more gold medals for taste than any other light beer. In the summer, enjoy Miller Lite on a hot day, at a music festival or during holidays like the 4th of July, Memorial Day, Labor Day or Father's Day. It's also the perfect beer to accompany sporting events such as Football, Basketball, Baseball and NASCAR. Tailgating or hosting a BBQ with friends? Make sure to have Miller Lite on hand. Don't forget to bring the original light beer to your favorite holiday party (and maybe one of our Ugly Holiday Sweaters) to enjoy with friends.

Home RICE ( ALL PRODUCTS WITH PICS ) Hunza Valley (Parboiled)

Hunza Valley - Parboiled (Organic)

Hunza Valley rice is famous for its full flavor, richness and nutrition. Rice from Hunza are short grain and contain many minerals, including all those known to be essential for good health and vitality. Unlike other rice, Hunza Rice are not processed with chemicals and contains no preservative or additives.

After cooking, the grains are soft and cling together. Because of these properties, the short grain Hunza Valley rice is especially suitable in recipes where a creamy texture is desired, such as puddings, rice balls, croquettes, paella and risotto.

About Hunza Valley:
The Hunza Valley (Urdu: ہنزہ) is a mountainous valley in Gilgit in the Gilgit-Baltistan region. The Hunza valley is situated to the north of the Hunza River, at an elevation of around 2,500 metres (8,200 ft). The territory of Hunza is about 7,900 square kilometres (3,100 sq mi). Several high peaks rise above 6,000 metres (20,000 ft) in the surroundings of Hunza valley. The valley provides spectacular views of some of the most beautiful and magnificent mountains of the world which include Rakaposhi 7,788 metres (25,551 ft)7,788 m (25,551 ft), Ultar Sar 7,388 metres (24,239 ft)Bojahagur Duanasir II 7,329 metres (24,045 ft), Ghenta Peak 7,090 metres (23,261 ft), Hunza Peak 6,270 metres (20,571 ft), Darmyani Peak 6,090 metres (19,980 ft), and Bublimating (Ladyfinger Peak) 6,000 metres (19,685 ft).

As much as the valley is famous for its beauty, the people of Hunza are noted for their friendliness and hospitality. The local languages spoken are Burushaski, Wakhi and Shina, many people understand Urdu. The literacy rate of the Hunza valley is believed to be more than 90%. In the early 70s, National Geographic ran an extensive series of articles investigating claims of long-lived people around the world. Without focusing too much on documented maximum age, the truly extraordinary fact is that all reports from the Hunza mention that the elderly population is fit, full of vitality and virtually free from disease, which is also attributed to their diet.

Lotus Loose Tea Canister

Introducing Lotus, a curated collection of relaxing teas for mind, body & spirit. Tea Forté is proud to present the next elevation of tea. This unique and unprecedented gourmet collection of highest-grade, small-lot, certified organic teas have been difficult to source as they are rarely exported. Reflecting the creativity and craftsmanship of this ultimate tea experience, Lotus comes exquisitely presented in an unapologetically modern design evoking the sophistication and sensory experience that these teas offer. Each recyclable canister is air tight and filled with the same blends offered in our signature pyramid infuser. 35-50 servings per canister. All teas are organic.

You may also like

The Old Hall Inn

The Old Hall Inn


0.5 miles
Whitehough, High Peak, SK23 6EJ

Set against a backdrop of verdant rolling hills, in the picture-postcard hamlet of Whitehough, is the Old Hall Inn. The pub’s historical features have been beautifully preserved, but the offering is totally up to date. Behind the bar, eight hand pumps boast a regularly changing array of the best local craft beer – a selection that’s repeatedly won the inn the title of Derby CAMRA’s Pub of the Year. Alongside this, there’s fruity cask cider, 40 varieties of gin and an impressive hand-picked wine list. Wine connoisseurs in particular will enjoy the selection on offer, which is chosen through a regular series of wine tasting events. In the kitchen, eight talented chefs give imaginative twists to popular classics. You might sample Moroccan Scotch egg with homemade hummus, or creamy chicken

 parfait with pistachio butter, rosemary focaccia and onion marmalade. To follow, choose from delectable seasonal mains like creamy pea risotto with a sprinkling of Parmesan, or perhaps spring lamb with courgette purée and black garlic hash browns.

The pub spills through into an adjoining Elizabethan manor house, and guests planning private parties can enjoy the use of several striking dining rooms or the unforgettable Minstrels Gallery. Visitors can also enjoy a restful night’s sleep in the characterful guest bedrooms, several of which include charming four-poster beds and free-standing baths.

+2The Old Hall Inn

Cool Beans Put The Chill On Watery Iced Coffee

Summer will be here before we know it and a lot of us will be trading in our steaming cup of cappuccino for an icier coffee fix.  If you like to prepare fancy, chilled coffee drinks for yourself and your guests then you should take a look at Cool Beans from Fred and Friends.

This distinctive ice cube tray features molds in the shape of giant coffee beans.  It is meant to be filled with brewed coffee and then frozen into coffee cubes.  As all of us coffee addicts know, iced java is usually served over a glassful of regular ice cubes.  The drink starts out rich, flavorful and delicious, but as the cubes melt it becomes watery and somewhat disappointing.

Normally you just have two choices; you can either slam back your beverage before you have a chance to really relax or you can take your time and ending up with a drink that is just a shadow of its former self.  With some Cool Beans cubes in your cup you can keep your brew full of flavor and intensity.

The tray is made of durable, coffee-toned silicone and is completely dishwasher safe.

 Source: WorldWideFred.com

  • Deal Description

    Eating a hearty steak makes you feel like a king, much like wearing a crown or banishing the dog to a small island in the South Atlantic. Rule with a silver fork with this Groupon.

    Choose Between Two Options

    •   - $30 for $65 worth of steakhouse fare and non-alcoholic drinks SundayThursday
    •   - $30 for $60 worth of steakhouse fare and non-alcoholic drinks Friday or Saturday

    Myron's Prime Steakhouse imports USDA Prime Beef, which ranks within the top 2% of the nation's supply. After handpicking and tenderizing each cut, chefs prepare entrees such as Kansas City strip steaks ($45.95) and large filet steaks ($46.95). Chefs also offer seafood entrees and appetizers such as sauteed mussels ($13.95) and escargot ($12.95). See the full menu.

    Myron's Prime Steakhouse

    Understated confidence comes through in everything from the clean lines of the modern, but not stark, interior to the relaxed, yet professional service, to the cuisine itself, according to MySA food critic Edmund Tijerina, who especially enjoyed the bone-in ribeye and chocolate cake at San Antonio's Myron's Prime Steakhouse. The restaurant represents the culmination of more than three decades of study in the art and science of steak. After gleaning everything he could from successful steakhouses, owner Bill Been decided to open his own. In 2003, he and his wife founded Myron's Prime Steakhouse in a historic New Braunfels theater. Eight years later, they launched a second location in San Antonio, which earned the distinction as "Best Steakhouse in San Antonio" from the Destination Guide. Both supply the same USDA prime steaks, which originate from corn-fed, Midwestern cows who cheer for the Wisconsin Badgers. Chefs handpick short loins and tenderize them with a wet-aging process, and dry-age other steaks to enhance their meaty flavors. Side dishes such as stuffed tomatoes with chives in gorgonzola cheese complement the steaks they accompany.

Buy almonds online:

Buy walnuts online:

To buy walnuts online, Anaha comes up as the best spot. Anaha walnuts are fresh and Crunchy and taste sweeter than other walnut kernels. Kashmiri walnuts have a naturally bitter taste but are healthier than any different walnut kernels. Walnuts are most often eaten on their own as a snack but can also be used to garnish salads, pasta, breakfast cereals, soups, and baked goods. Besides Anaha Walnuts and Almonds, Anaha provides raisin, pumpkin seeds, cashew, blackberries, pistachio, mix seeds, blueberries, cranberries, etc.
Introduced by Shri Radhe Food Products, Anaha has been serving its customers for almost six decades. A culinary jewel in the heart of this university town.

THIS RESTAURANT IS CLOSED Restaurant Tallent Restaurant Review

: Restaurant Tallent draws not only the students and alumni of this university town, but also diners from across the state as well as neighboring Illinois and Ohio. The reason is the inspired dishes of chef-owner David Tallent and his wife Kristen, prepared by a well-trained food-passionate staff. Start the gastronomic adventure with a whimsical country ham and quail egg biscuit or Indiana sweet corn with house-made pancetta, chanterelles and Parmesan. Entrées often are simple, but with a twist. That may mean Indiana rib-eye steak with fried potato salad, corn relish and onion rings, or Gunthorp Farms pork with tomato pie, collard greens, ham hock and boiled peanut chow-chow. A five-course tasting menu crafted for the entire table features ingredients from local farmers and artisan producers. Servers can help with wine selections and suggest after-dinner drinks to go with your blackberry peach cobbler that's topped with sorghum grits ice cream. And, of course, you can eat your vegetables with a zucchini bread waffle with ice cream and chocolate sauce.


GAYOT's Annual Restaurant Awards honor America's best chefs, as well as promising newcomers and a top restaurateur.
